Posts.Content: CreoleGirl wrote: I had a unilateral mastectomy of my right breast on 3/2 with DIEP reconstruction (stomach tissue used & tummy tuck). I slept in a recliner for a few weeks but finally moved to the bed with help from a wedge pillow about a month after surgery. I HATE sleeping on my back and it's starting to drive me nuts being elevated. I just want to sleep normally. How long was it before any of you were able to sleep on your side and felt like you were sleeping somewhat comfortably? Dx 12/29/2014, Right, 1cm, Stage IB, Grade 2, 0/3 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2+ Surgery 3/1/2015 Mastectomy: Right; Reconstruction (right): DIEP flap Log in to post a reply
